title: Forecast on U.S. petroleum refinery end-use market output 2020 to 2024
summary: This statistic displays a Forecast of the petroleum and refinery end-use from output in the U.S. year 2020 to 2024 .
year 2022 to 2023 , the petroleum and refinery end-use from output is expected to increase by 2.2 % .
Appreciation of the U.S. dollar is likely to reduce costs and increase production in the chemical industry .
